description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. A lonely baker tries to bake himself friends and before he knows it his kitchen is being taken over by evil pastries.Now your goal is to defend your kitchen and drive out the pastries.
description.short: A lonely baker tries to bake himself friends and before he knows it his kitchen is being taken over by evil pastries.Now your goal is to defend your kitchen and drive out the pastries.
